attributes.action: Pay all MP’s exclusively in “claps” until our care workers are paid correctly
attributes.additional_details:
“Tell us more about why you want the Government or Parliament to do it”

Basic human decency.
attributes.background: Since this government seem to think shops, landlords and utility companies are going to allow clapping for our careers as currency, lets change the salary rate of all MP’s and their aides to “claps per hour” until such time as these elected clappers see fit to pay our care workers properly

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here:
http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
